title: Breakingviews TV: Higher ed under assault
text:
Breakingviews TV: Higher ed under assault 9:11pm IST - 13:41 
Peter Salovey, Yale’s president, talks to Rob Cox at Davos about rising populist mistrust of elite institutions and how Yale’s endowment can continue to beat the market and overcome punitive changes in the Trump tax bill. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Peter Salovey, Yale’s president, talks to Rob Cox at Davos about rising populist mistrust of elite institutions and how Yale’s endowment can continue to beat the market and overcome punitive changes in the Trump tax bill.
